text: Michel Dumont (29 January 1941 – 13 August 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was the artistic director for the Théâtre Jean-Duceppe in Montreal from 1991 to 2018. He was known for his movie roles in Chocolate Eclair (1979), Without Her (2005) and Café de Flore (2011). Dumont died on 13 August 2020 of lung cancer in Montreal at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian theatre directors Category:Actors from Montreal
title: Michel Dumont
